name: Forgiveness Edition
preview: You're human. You'll make mistakes, often at other people's expense. They're human. They will also make mistakes, often at your expense. Whether you're needing to forgive another person, or yourself, forgiveness can be difficult. It means letting go of the idea that things could have gone differently. It doesn't mean excusing bad behavior, it means freeing yourself.
To play, either journal your responses or explore these questions with someone else on their forgiveness journey. When you forgive the past you create the space to redefine your future.

How do you
